verbs.description: [ARG0: halloween death] [V: sends] [ARG1: 1] [ARG2: to prison] a tamarac man convicted of running down and killing a man with his pickup after neighborhood teens egged his house on a halloween night was sentenced friday to life in richard day the house robert campbell halloween prison
